itemDescription: British politician, Conservative Party MP for Angus, elected June 2017

wikipedia_page.main: Kirstene Janette Hair (born 12 August 1989) is a former Scottish Conservative Party politician. She was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Angus between 2017 and 2019.

response: * Kirstene Hair, Conservative Member of Parliament from 2017 to 2019 for Angus.
|Kirstene Hair, Barry Gardiner, Humza Yousaf, Angela Haggerty, Iain Anderson

response: David Michael Doogan (born 4 March 1973) is a Scottish National Party (SNP) politician who was elected as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Angus in the 2019 United Kingdom general election, after defeating incumbent Conservative candidate Kirstene Hair.

Upon the announcement of the 2019 general election Doogan was selected as the SNP candidate for Angus. He won election on 12 December 2019 after defeating the incumbent Conservative MP Kirstene Hair, and was sworn into Parliament on 18 December.
